firstNightReminder: Point to two players that are not the Demon.
name: Knight
ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.

name: Alsaahir
ability: Once per day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

name: Zealot
ability: If there are 5 more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Harpy and prompt them to choose 2 players. Place the Mad token next to the 1st player and the Evil token next to the 2nd.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Harpy and prompt them to choose 2 players. Place the Mad token next to the 1st player and the Evil token next to the 2nd.
name: Harpy
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd player is evil, or one or both might die.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Yaggababble and show them their secret phrase.
otherNightReminder: Each night, you may mark players with Dead reminders based on how many times the Yaggababble said their phrase today.
name: Yaggababble
ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.
